description:
QR-Code Reader with integrated keyboard-shortcut, tray icon and notification

QR-Code Reader is a QR code scanner application that allows you to scan and decode QR codes directly from your computer screen.
This app is made possible by Windows Snipping Tool, the ZXing.
Net library and AutoHotkey.
- Integrated Windows 11 Build 26052 WiFi connection dialog
- Improved response time for touch recognition
